------------------ POLY ------------------
SVCoef*(  (gamma* (c_1*v1_1 + ... c_n*v1_n) +coef0)  *...degree...*  (gamma*(c_1*v1_1 + ... c_n*v1_n) + coef0) ) +
+ SVCoef*((gamma*(c_1*v2_1 + ... c_n*v2_n) + coef0)*.   degree..*(gamma*(c_1*v2_1 + ... c_n*v2_n) + coef0)) - rho

gamma = 0.5  coef0 = 1.0
CAMPIONE = ( 0,226964  0,491 )

SV1 ( 0,21751  0,49433 ) = 0,04936693964 + 0,24271603 = 0,29208296964 / 2 +1 = 1,14604148482^4 = 1,725048678012876
SV2 ( 0,23078  0,51545 ) = 0,05237875192 + 0,25308595 = 0,30546470192 / 2 +1 = 1,15273235096^4 = 1,765687841617354
SV3 ( 0,22071  0,51669 ) = 0,05009322444 + 0,25369479 =                      = 1,15189400722^4 = 1,760556939124208
SV4 ( 0,21233  0,46617 ) = 0,04819126612 + 0,22888947 =                      = 1,13854036806^4 = 1,680326723037129
SV5 ( 0,22696  0,49682 ) = 0,05151174944 +            = 0,29545036944 /2 +1  = 1,14772518472^3 = 1,735208419036644
SV6 ( 0,22651  0,48274 ) = 0,05140961564 + 0,23702534 = 0,28843495564 /2 +1 = 1,14421747782 ^3 = 1,714092715070696

rho = 0,12148940563201904
5,251293458754438 - 5,129627857144469 = 0,121665601609969 - rho = 0,00017619597795


------------------ RBF ------------------
CAMPIONE = ( 0,226964  0,491 )
                         = (c_1 - v1_1)*(c1 - v1_1) + ... + (c_n - v1_n)*(c_n - v1_n) = val
                         = exp(-gamma*val)
SV1 ( 0,21751  0,49433 ) = 0,009454^2 + (-0,00333)^2 = 0,000089378116 + 0,0000110889 = exp(-0.5 * 0.000100467016)= 0.9999497677536815
SV2 ( 0,23078  0,51545 ) = 0.9996938646909794
SV3 ( 0,22071  0,51669 ) = 0.9996505167754943
SV4 ( 0,21233  0,46617 ) = 0.9995847448143105
SV5 ( 0,22696  0,49682 ) = 0.9999830639354168
SV6 ( 0,22651  0,48274 ) = 0.99996578372739

0.9999497677536815 + 0.9996938646909794 + 0.9996505167754943 - 0.9995847448143105 - 0.9999830639354168 - 0.99996578372739 =
= -0.00023944325696201307 - (-0.0002378523349761963)(rho) = -0.00000159092198581677

(POWER(EXP(1), " + gamma + "*((c_1 - v1_1)*(c1 - v1_1) + ---";
